statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
A simple problem
Problem Description
You have a multiple set,and now there are three kinds of operations:
1 x : add number x to set
2 : delete the minimum number (if the set is empty now,then ignore it)
3 : query the maximum number (if the set is empty now,the answer is 0)

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line contains a number $N$ ($N\leq 10^6$),representing the number of operations.
Next $N$ line ,each line contains one or two numbers,describe one operation.
The number in this set is not greater than $10^9$.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each operation 3,output a line representing the answer.
